room_rent: 1% of sum insured or maximum up to Rs. 20,000 /- per day
modern_treatments: Up to 50% of sum insured (5 & 10 Lacs SI), Up to 40% of sum insured (15 & 20 Lacs SI), Up to 30% of sum insured (25 Lacs+ SI)

ambulance.air: Covered for sum insured of Rs 10 Lakhs & above only. Up to 10% of the sum insured per year.

restoration_benefit: Up to 100% of the Basic SI, available immediately upon partial/full utilization of the limit of coverage
no_claim_bonus: 20% of the expiring Sum Insured from the second year onwards, up to 100% of the Basic SI
wellness_program: Available for Insured aged => 18 years. Earn reward points and avail premium discount up to 10% on renewal premium.
preventive_health_checkup: Covered (limits vary by SI and age, inclusive of costs of vaccination)
women_wellness: Special benefits: Daughter can continue as a dependent child if unmarried and/or unemployed beyond 25 years and max up to 30 years; Pregnant women can buy this policy by submitting scan reports during 12th and 20th week of pregnancy; Continuity benefits accrued before marriage considered for Maternity Section.

waiting_periods.ante_natal_care: 2 years (for 5 & 10 Lacs SI), 1 year (for 15 Lacs+ SI)
waiting_periods.in_utero_fetal_surgery_repair: 2 years (for 5 & 10 Lacs SI), 1 year (for 15 Lacs+ SI)
waiting_periods.delivery_expenses: 2 years (for 5 & 10 Lacs SI), 1 year (for 15 Lacs+ SI)
waiting_periods.miscarriage_due_to_accident: 2 years (for 5 & 10 Lacs SI), 1 year (for 15 Lacs+ SI)
